name: itinerantly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves travelling from one place to another for work, or living in different places without a permanent home: He preached itinerantly but failed to receive a call to be ordained anywhere permanently. Divorced with one child, he sold his possessions and lives itinerantly, staying with friends or family, or camping when the weather is good.
More examplesFewer examplesFor a time she was living itinerantly.Drunkenness was commonly regarded as characteristic of an itinerantly musical lifestyle.
